name: InSinkErator CleanTaste Filter Cartridges (2-Pack) - Quick Change Design
description: These InSinkErator Replacement Filter Cartridges (2-Pack) keep your water tasting clean by reducing the presence of sediment and chlorine. These filters are ideal to use in your instant hot-water dispenser and feature a sanitary quick-change design to minimize contact with used filter material. The twist-and-lock design allows for quick-and-easy filter swaps.Reduces chlorine taste and odor, as well as sediments for clean-tasting water6 - 12 month filter life for convenient maintenance intervalsSanitary quick-change design to minimize contact with used filter materialTwist-and-lock design for quick-and-easy filter changesNSFA standard 42 listed for quality assuranceAutomatically shuts water off when filter cartridge is replaced
